Title: Requires insurance companies to issue joint checks for payment to an insured and a health care provider in certain circumstances
Summary: Requires insurance companies to issue joint checks for payment to an insured and a health care provider in certain circumstances.
LawCode: Add ยง4406-h, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring insurance companies to issue joint checks for payment to an insured and a health care provider in certain circumstances
